I'm working with newest front-end frameworks like Angular, React and Vue. What you are seeing now is my portfolio from Code Fellows. If you like this portfolio template, make sure to ‚≠ê the repository to make it more recognizable for other users. Thank you üíú

projects.title: MatchStravaganza
projects.description: A matching game that allows players to strengthen their memory in an engaging way while enjoying gazing upon cute pictures of pets! They compete against the clock and previous scores to improve their high scores while building their memory. It allows you to reset the deck at any point during or after the game, and allows you to change your username

projects.title: Bus Mall
projects.description: Allows users to vote for favorite products for use in a theoretical bus based catalog. It then displays the results in table and graphical form. Additionally it's customizable by number of rounds and number of pictures.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This first project I developed at Code Fellows. It generated tables representing theoretical demand for cookies at various cookie stands throughout the world and correlates that to staffing needs per hour. Various customizable parameters enable the user to simulate demand under different circumstances/assumptions
